title: A shorte recapitulacion or abrigement of Erasmus Enchiridion brefely comprehendinge the summe and contents therof. Very profitable and necessary to be rede of all trew Christen men. Drawne out by M. Couerdale Anno. 1545
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publicationStmtDate: In the moneth of May. Anno. 1545.]
